response.name: Response 1
response.body:
{
    "name": "api-gatway",
    "profiles": [
        "main"
    ],
    "label": null,
    "version": "f7fa553f14c421056a4c24f91b9e10cae2d10707",
    "state": null,
    "propertySources": [
        {
            "name": "file:///C:/Users/Karl/Desktop/spms-config-repo/api-gatway.yml",
            "source": {
                "spring.application.name": "api-gateway",
                "spring.cloud.loadbalancer.rule": "random",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[0].id": "parking-space-service",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[0].uri": "lb://PARKING-SPACE-SERVICE",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[0].predicates[0]": "Path=/parking-space-service/**",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[1].id": "vehicle-service",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[1].uri": "lb://VEHICLE-SERVICE",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[1].predicates[0]": "Path=/vehicle-service/**",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[2].id": "user-service",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[2].uri": "lb://USER-SERVICE",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[2].predicates[0]": "Path=/user-service/**",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[3].id": "payment-service",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[3].uri": "lb://PAYMENT-SERVICE",
                "spring.cloud.gateway.routes[3].predicates[0]": "Path=/payment-service/**",
                "eureka.client.service-url.defaultZone": "http://localhost:8761/eureka/"
            }
        }
    ]
}

response.name: Response 1
